title: Ohhhhohoo no you don't!
body:
Nooooooo please no..

#**NO!**

Why is there random **red** shit everywhere?

I get that he has an attack speed boost now, but that is not how it's done!
This is what an attack speed boost looks like:
https://68.media.tumblr.com/b59ef9e63d42856836d02951d3fe931b/tumblr_nw6mkuvXx81qgrdiqo1_500h.jpg

Look how it seamlessly matches the skin.
The Skin is green, the particle is green.
The Skin is all about slime and grossness, note how the particle effect is also slimy and gross.
Note the lack of redness!

There is absolutely 0% in this particle effect that matches Azir.
Not only is it not sand-like in any way, but it's bright **red**!?
It looks like some kind of _lifesteal_ particle that should be on Rengar or Aatrox or a blood moon skin or something.


You don't just go and slap some crappy red particle on a champion who hasn't got an iota of red on his whole body. Nope nope nope!

He's a golden sand emperor, whose soldiers are gold, whose sand particles are gold, and anything that isn't gold, is purple! Why the hell would you go and put bright blood red in there?!


Next patch, please, **please** match it up with each of his skins individually, It needs to be golden or purple on his base, green on his underworld, blue or purple on his galactic, blue or golden on his SKT, and maybe you can keep the red (or green) on his warring kingdoms!

I can see why it only took you 3 months to come up with this rework, you haven't even made a new particle for him, you've just taken some other champ or item's shitty particle effect and just slapped it on all of his skins indiscriminately. Why?

It looks hideous!

Plenty of champs like Zombie Nunu have their attack speed boost match their skins.
You don't just get to skimp out here, cos its a 'quick fix'.

I can abide by many things, I may not like the rework _(full disclosure will inevitably come later once I have fully tested it)_, but I see that it was necessary in some levels of play. But I can not abide the reckless disregard for aesthetics! When there is no reason!
It subtracts from his whole thematic as a golden sand emperor.

It would take someone a couple of hours **max** to change the colour of these particle effects. 
Please don't leave them like this...

I will gladly pay from my own pocket for one of your staff to change the colour of them, if you wont.

Please... I'm actually begging here.

{{sticker:sg-janna}}
